member.name: M:Xunit.Extensions.StringAssertionExtensions.ShouldContain(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that a string contains a given sub-string, using the current culture.

member.exception: Thrown when the sub-string is not present inside the string

member.summary: Verifies that a string contains a given sub-string, using the given comparison type.

The sub-string expected to be in the string
The type of string comparison to perform
member.exception: Thrown when the sub-string is not present inside the string

member.name: M:Xunit.Extensions.StringAssertionExtensions.ShouldNotContain(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that a string does not contain a given sub-string, using the current culture.
member.param: The string to be inspected
The sub-string which is expected not to be in the string
member.exception: Thrown when the sub-string is present inside the string

member.name: M:Xunit.Extensions.StringAssertionExtensions.ShouldNotContain(System.String,System.String,System.StringComparison)
member.summary: Verifies that a string does not contain a given sub-string, using the current culture.

The sub-string which is expected not to be in the string

member.exception: Thrown when the sub-string is present inside the given string
